section.title: Overview
section.para: If you are writing a Maven Plugin the time comes that you need to test your plugin in an real environment. The best thing you can do is to write integration test by the help of the maven-invoker-plugin.

example.title: Folder Structure of basic integration test
example.programlisting: . |-- pom.xml `-- src |-- main | `-- java | `-- com | `-- soebes | `-- maui | `-- it | `-- BitMask.java `-- test `-- java `-- com `-- soebes `-- maui `-- it |-- BitMaskIT.java `-- BitMaskTest.java
